column5: Morning all, well looks like spring is actually here, I'm starting to see some greenish brownish stuff under the snow if front of my house  .  Really looking forward to getting on some new soft waters this year.  Anyone else hoping to try out a new spot???  Maureen
Morning Mo.  The grass has been green down here for a few days so far and yes I started looking through my maps and gear starting last week.
Morning. The snow is just about all gone here in the Rideau Lakes and there is lots of water on top of the ice on the lakes.

Yep...out here in the east burbs of Toronto, the snow is gone from our grass and our trees are beginning to bud.  It actually smelled like spring yesterday....ahhh....the smell of decaying vegetation and mud....nothing beats that after a long winter...hehe.
Mornin' Mo.........yes I have greenish brown stuff on my lawn too...unfortunately I will have to pick it up soon before the weather gets any warmer.....lol  J...
